DOC.brief_title: Fish Oil Folate Supplementation During Pregnancy
DOC.criteria: singleton pregnancy gestation < 20 week enrollment intention deliver one study center body weight time enrollment 50 kg 92 kg serious chronic illness ( eg , diabetes , hepatitis ) use fish oil supplement since begin pregnancy use folate vitamin B12 supplement gestation week 16
